TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IUIService

summary.span: 能夠與裝載 (Host) 設計工具的開發環境物件之使用者介面互動。

span.span: Enables interaction with the user interface of the development environment object that is hosting the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以顯示錯誤訊息、 顯示對話方塊，以及透過取得環境屬性的主應用程式，例如對話方塊和色彩配置的字型字典屬性。 can display error messages, show dialog boxes, and get ambient properties of the host, such as the font for dialog boxes and color schemes, through the dictionary property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立提供呼叫方法的設計工具動詞命令功能表命令的設計工具。The following code example creates a designer that provides designer verb menu commands that call methods of the . 若要使用的範例中，編譯組件、 範例程式碼，並在 Windows Forms 應用程式中新增組件的參考。To use the example, compile the sample code to an assembly, and add a reference to the assembly in a Windows Forms application. 如果您使用 Visual Studio 中，`IUIServiceExampleControl`會自動新增至**工具箱**。If you are using Visual Studio, the `IUIServiceExampleControl` is automatically added to the **Toolbox**. 新增的執行個體`IUIServiceExampleControl`至。Add an instance of the `IUIServiceExampleControl` to a . 若要存取叫用的設計工具動詞命令方法，是以滑鼠右鍵按一下控制項的介面上或按一下控制項的智慧標籤圖像 （glyph） 和從智慧標籤面板中選取項目。To access the designer verb commands that invoke methods, either right-click on the control's surface or click on the control's smart tag glyph and select an item from the smart tag panel. [!code-cpp[IUIServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IUIServiceExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IUIServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IUIServiceExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IUIServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IUIServiceExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件編輯器可以顯示類似的屬性頁從元件物件模型 (COM) 元件編輯器表單。Component editors can display a component editor form that is similar to a property page from the Component Object Model (COM). 這個方法會檢查以判斷指定的元件是否有可以顯示。This method checks to determine whether the specified component has a that can display a .

summary.span: 取得顯示對話方塊時應該當做擁有人的視窗。

span.span: Gets the window that should be used as the owner when showing dialog boxes.

returns.span: ，指出視窗擁有任何子對話方塊。

span.span: An that indicates the window to own any child dialog boxes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有些對話方塊的擁有者應用程式做為父代，並不會顯示在 工作清單。Some dialog boxes are parented to an owner application and are not visible in the task list. 這個方法會傳回指出應該是對話方塊的這類的整合式的開發環境從繁衍的擁有者的視窗。This method returns an that indicates the window that should be the owner for dialog boxes of this sort that are spawned from an integrated development environment.

summary.span: 設定指示 UI 已經變更的旗標。

span.span: Sets a flag indicating the UI has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會指示 UI 已經變更，應該要重新整理。This method indicates that the UI has been changed and should be refreshed. 請務必指出需要重新整理，每當工具列或功能表項目的狀態變更時。It is important to indicate the need for a refresh whenever a toolbar or menu item's status changes. 大部分的開發環境會快取的快的速度，這些項目狀態，並需要知道在需要更新時。Most development environments cache the status of these elements for speed, and need to know when they need to be updated. 這個方法會呼叫，比方說之後選取設計工具的檢視，以啟用 剪下和複製功能表項目內的物件。This method is called, for example, after objects have been selected within designer view to enable the cut and copy menu items.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.IDictionary Styles { get; }
.property instance class System.Collections.IDictionary Styles
Public ReadOnly Property Styles As IDictionary
public: property System::Collections::IDictionary ^ Styles { System::Collections::IDictionary ^ get(); };
member this.Styles : System.Collections.IDictionary

summary.span: 取得主應用程式環境特定的樣式集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of styles that are specific to the host's environment.
An containing style settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字典可以提供從主機環境的資訊。The dictionary can provide information from the host environment. 最低限度，這包含適用於標準的 UI 文字和色彩來反白顯示使用的字型。At a minimum, this consists of the font that should be used for standard UI text, and the color to use for highlighting. 這些必要樣式"DialogFont 」 和 「 HighlightColor"。These required styles are "DialogFont" and "HighlightColor". 這些樣式的值可能會擷取使用樣式做為字典中，存取當做索引子使用索引鍵的字典索引鍵。The values for these styles may be retrieved by using the style as a key for the dictionary, accessing the dictionary using the key as an indexer. 例如: (物件，實作)。樣式 [（樣式名稱字串以引號括住）]。For example: (object implementing ).Styles[(style name string in quotes)]. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會從主機環境取得對話方塊字型。The following code example gets the dialog box font from the host environment. [!code-cpp[Classic IUIService.Styles Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IUIService.Styles Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic IUIService.Styles Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IUIService.Styles Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IUIService.Styles Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IUIService.Styles Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
